name: guyRPG (placeholder title) tech demo
description:
Movement: WASD  
Spells: 1-7
Character: C
Inventory: I
Menu: ESC
Cancel: ESC

This is a demo of guyRPG [placeholder]'s spell system, animation priorities, camera, and use/throw for certain items. The character and inventory windows are nonfunctional. The slimes cannot hurt you.

The level can be reset from the ESC Menu
